root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 10-4-1, translated into en
root.data:
Share of work in GDP = Total compensation of employees / Gross Domestic Product * 100

As mentioned above, this method of calculation does not provide a comprehensive measure of the share of labor income, as it does not take into account the labor income of self-employed workers.

Ideally, whenever possible, the numerator should be adjusted to include not only the remuneration of employees, but also the earnings of self-employed workers.
